name: queryMap
syntax: queryMap(query, function(row [, currentRow] [, query] ){} [, parallel] [, maxThreads])
description: Maps each query row using a function to manipulate the rows fields

params.name: callback
params.description: Closure or a function reference that will be called for each of the iteration.

callback_params.description: A struct with all of the columns for the current iteration
callback_params.name: row

callback_params.description: The value for the current iteration
callback_params.name: currentRow

callback_params.description: A reference of the original struct
callback_params.name: query

params.name: parallel
params.description: Lucee4.5+ true if the items can be executed in parallel

params.name: maxThreads
params.description: Lucee4.5+ the maximum number of threads to use when parallel = true
